metadata.Title: CVE-2020-0067 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In f2fs_xattr_generic_list of xattr.c, there is a possible out of boundsread due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local informationdisclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is notrequired for exploitation.Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel.Android ID: A-120551147.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-0067` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-106-generic - 4.15.0-106.107
linux-image-4.15.0-106-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-106.107
linux-image-4.15.0-106-lowlatency - 4.15.0-106.107
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-106-generic - 4.15.0-106.107
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-106-lowlatency - 4.15.0-106.107
No subscription required
